description.title: Create SS1 Unit 2 Engage Section Activities
description.summary: Design and create engaging activities for Social Studies Grade 1 Unit 2 focusing on community helpers and local landmarks
description.details:
The Engage section needs 5 interactive activities that introduce students to: - Community helpers in their neighborhood - Local landmarks and their significance - Geographic features around their community - Cultural traditions and celebrations - Map reading basics for young learners
Activities should follow NSA's PBR methodology and include multimedia elements.
description.acceptance_criteria: - All activities align with Grade 1 learning objectives - Content is age-appropriate and engaging - Includes accessibility considerations - Multimedia elements properly referenced - Activities support kinesthetic and visual learning styles

requirements.deliverable: 5 structured activity descriptions with resource requirements
Asset requirements list (images, videos, QR codes)

progress.current_status: Initial research completed, activity outlines in draft

blockers.blocker: Waiting for curriculum standards committee approval on Grade 1 objectives

risks.risk: Multimedia assets may not be available in time for content creation

updates.update: Ticket created. Starting research on Grade 1 community helper activities. Reviewed existing NSA curriculum for similar content patterns.

notifications.notify: Asset requirements will be available by August 7th for multimedia planning
Content structure may require new activity template types

learning_objectives.objective: Students will identify community helpers and their roles
Students will recognize local landmarks and their significance
Students will demonstrate basic map reading skills
Students will describe cultural traditions in their community

pedagogical_notes.note: Include hands-on manipulatives for kinesthetic learners
Use visual aids and real photographs of local landmarks
Ensure content represents diverse community helpers

accessibility_requirements.requirement: Alt text for all images and visual content
Large print options for text-heavy activities
Color contrast compliance for visual elements

assessment_criteria.criteria: Student can point to landmarks on a simple map
Student can describe one cultural tradition
